relevant_findings.metaphyseal_widening: Obvious widening of the metaphyseal areas of the larger long bones
relevant_findings.bowing_of_long_bones: Symmetric bowing of the long bones mainly affecting lower limbs
relevant_findings.hypotonia: Patient D1 was hypotonic at birth

kidney_stones.patient_D1: Presented with painful gross hematuria and findings compatible with nephrolithiasis at age 7.5 yr
kidney_stones.patient_D2: Developed kidney stones at age 7 yr

changes_over_time.patient_D1: Worsening with age, particularly with symptomatic nephrolithiasis
changes_over_time.patient_D2: Emergence of kidney stones at age 7 yr suggests progression over time
